name: Ar tonelico Qoga: Knell of Ar Ciel
name_original: Ar tonelico Qoga: Knell of Ar Ciel
description: Ar tonelico Qoga is an RPG set in a world where the planet has been devastated and all of its living inhabitants live on artificial towers. Play as Aoto and his friends as you rebel against a fascist army, save your friends' lives, and fulfill a 700 year old destiny.
